About Me

I'm a versatile professional with a background in software development, marine engineering, and machinery maintenance. I'm committed to delivering innovative solutions through robust problem-solving skills and proficiency in various programming languages and frameworks.

My Journey

My journey started with a data processing technician course and has led me to languages like Ruby, Python, JavaScript, and web frameworks like Ruby on Rails and Sinatra. My profile showcases repositories across various programming languages, highlighting my problem-solving capabilities.

What I Bring to the Table

  • Problem-Solving Ninja: Equipped with analytical thinking and pragmatic problem-solving skills, adept at dissecting challenges and finding efficient solutions.
  • Adaptability Guru: Thriving in diverse environments, well-prepared to tackle anything that comes my way in the fast-paced world of software development.
  • Teamwork Aficionado: Collaboration has always been at the core of my work, bringing effective teamwork skills to every software project.
  • Communication Prodigy: Equipped with strong interpersonal, oral, and written communication skills, bridging the gap between technical jargon and plain language.
  • Efficiency Expert: Passionate about improving operational efficiency, leveraging software solutions to streamline processes and reduce downtime and costs.
  • Engineering Background: Experiences as a marine engineer and millwright mechanic have enriched my problem-solving abilities and honed attention to detail.
  • Hands-On Expertise: Working with heavy machinery and equipment has honed my precision, vital in software development where small errors can have big impacts.
